thread.title: Flyers G Neuvirth stops 30 shots in 2nd straight shutout, 3-0 win over Blackhawks
thread.title_full: Flyers G Neuvirth stops 30 shots in 2nd straight shutout, 3-0 win over Blackhawks

title: Flyers G Neuvirth stops 30 shots in 2nd straight shutout, 3-0 win over Blackhawks
text:
Flyers G Neuvirth stops 30 shots in 2nd straight shutout, 3-0 win over Blackhawks By DAN GELSTON AP Sports Writer   14, 2015 - 10:46 pmLast Updated: October 14, 2015 - 10:46 pm   
People: 
Pennsylvania (896) 
PHILADELPHIA â€” Michal Neuvirth stopped 30 shots in his second straight shutout, leading the Philadelphia Flyers to a 3-0 win over the Chicago Blackhawks on Wednesday night. 
Sam Gagner, Claude Giroux and Matt Read scored to lead the Flyers to their 12th straight regular-season home victory over Chicago. The Flyers have not lost to the Blackhawks in Philly during the regular season since Nov. 9, 1996. 
The Blackhawks beat the Flyers in the 2010 Stanley Cup Final and clinched with a Game 6 win in Philly. 
Filling in for Steve Mason, Neuvirth was sensational in his ninth career shutout. Mason missed a second straight game because of unspecified family reasons and there was no word when he would return.
